definition[0]: happening, done, or existing most of the time or in most situations
example[0]: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
example[1]: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
example[2]: She ate twice as much as usual.
example[3]: It is taking longer than usual for orders to reach our customers.
example[4]: It’s usual to keep records of all expenses.
note[1]: it is usual (for somebody) to do something
